DaD.item

Class ItemDropInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • DaD.item.ItemDropInfo

  • public class ItemDropInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used when creating monster to set their possible item drop.

    This will be used when a monster dies. We will browse each ItemDropInfo to check if the killer earned an item. Here each itemDropInfo refers to one item template. The item can be dropped _maxDrop times maximum. Each item have a drop rate of _dropRate percent.

    • Field Summary

      private double _dropRate 
      private ItemTemplate _itemTemplate
      Template of the possibly dropped item.
      private int _maxDrop
      Max time that the item can be dropped.
